column4: when I print multiple pages, rather than printing them all immediately one after another, my printer is pausing for a long period of time between each page. I have a Samsung ML2010, the latest version of CUPS, and I'm on 10.10 desktop. What might be causing this? I'm printing from evince..
Have you tried it on windows machine? Might be your printer's fault
for future reference, the printing also works fine with adobe reader - evince appears to be the problem.
